announcements: A Subscription will take place during the intervals of Performance, when they trust those Ladies, who frequent the WIndows and Market-place, will contribute what they think the Exhibition deserving of; and on whom Mr. J. will take the liberty of calling.
Messrs Jonamo & Boligna, assisted by Messrs. Saqui, &c, &c. of the Tivoli Gardens, Paris, and lately of Vauxhall, London.

featuredAttractionsForShow: the much-admired Fiery Comet, will take a direction several times across the Market-place, and set fire to the four Fighting Salamanders.
A Superb Balloon will ascend, which will discharge various Fire Works in ascending.
notes: For more details regarding the featured attractions listed, see playbill image. Includes a detailed order of the contents of the entire fireworks show.
